column5: Well, headed to Dunnville yesterday for the frist time with Jose (Alie Goby) for company. Morning started off goos with a shore lunch. Bacon and toast that is. Looked like I was staying for a week with all the gear I brought. Stove, BBQ, kettle, coffee perk, etc. We met up with a few guys there not from the board but hopefully soon. I caught the first fish of the day. I'm like yeah, my first cat. Then it came out of the water and I'm like yeah, my first carp. 28 inches 11lb 2oz. Pretty cool.      Later on Jose hooked into a cat 26inches 6lb 15oz    No more fish for us two the rest of the day. Two of the other guys beside us caught one each. 10lber and 11lber. All 3 cats were kept by them for the smoker.  We had a great day, sorry yours got cut short Jose. Will definatly do that again. I still need to get my first cat.  Curt
what am I chopped liver lol
Oh yeah! Some dude from Hamilton came, fished for half hour, left and left his net behind.  Sorry bud I had to do it. Hope to get your net to you soon.  Curt

I had my daughter with me her boyfriend was just diagnosed with full blown cancer so I had no choice but to leave , I have to start tying things to myself! .....in that time I was there they were really hitting!
Sorry to hear the news. Wish everyone well.
I recommend that site to everyone it is HOT HOT hot!
Nice fish boys Curt i think Jose is bad luck LOL  Rob
Yes i'm bad luck for you boys but i always walk away with fish unlike you old farts lol ROB lol
OLD FARTS  OLD FARTS  :angry:  Boy; you in for a world of schooling from some old farts on the 19th!
I hope so if not then i'll be the one schooling Mike Ciff your in a class on your own my friend        "LEGEND"
Don't let him go with your Cliff... he's bad luck to be in your boat...  Great fishing lads...
Wayne you old fart i'm not bad luck Your all just bad fishermen lol
Nice report. What did you get that carp on?? Worms?
Marko that Carp hit Cut bait no lie sucker meat
Yup. Fishmaster's cut bait it was.
Great report and pics nancur373 That's a beautiful carp you got into!!!  Congratulations and thanks for sharing Leechman
Guess it was not a vegetarian. I`ve caught them on Roe but never on sucker meat, that's just very strange hahah. Nice looking fish none the less
we used to catch carp with corn! They are scavengers will eat anything! ..why the ministry put up the carp barrier here in princess point!
